words.translation: Ta Ha

translations.1: Taa-Haa
translations.2: <u>Ta</u>h<u>a</u>

words.translation: Not|We (have) sent down|to you|the Quran|that you be distressed

translations.1: Maaa anzalnaa 'alaikal Qur-aana litashqaaa
translations.2: M<u>a</u> anzaln<u>a</u> AAalayka alqur<u>a</u>na litashq<u>a</u>

words.translation: (But)|(as) a reminder|for (those) who|fear

translations.1: Illaa tazkiratal limany yakhshaa
translations.2: Ill<u>a</u> ta<u>th</u>kiratan liman yakhsh<u>a</u>

words.translation: A revelation|from (He) Who|created|the earth|and the heavens|[the] high

translations.1: Tanzeelan mimman khalaqal arda was-samaawaatil 'ulaa
translations.2: Tanzeelan mimman khalaqa alarda waalssamawati alAAula

words.translation: The Most Gracious|over|the Throne|is established

translations.1: Ar-Rahmaanu 'alal 'Arshis tawaa
translations.2: Alrrahmanu AAala alAAarshi istawa

words.translation: To Him (belongs)|whatever|(is) in|the heavens|and whatever|(is) in|the earth|and whatever|(is) between them|and whatever|(is) under|the soil

translations.1: Lahoo maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa Wa-maa tahtas saraa
translations.2: Lahu ma fee alssamawati wama fee alardi wama baynahuma wama tahta alththara

words.translation: And if|you speak aloud|the word|then indeed He|knows|the secret|and the more hidden

translations.1: Wa-in tajhar bilqawli fainnahoo ya'lamus sirra Wa-akhfaa
translations.2: Wain tajhar bialqawli fainnahu yaAAlamu alssirra waakhfa

words.translation: Allah|(there is) no|god|except|Him|To Him (belong)|the Names|the Most Beautiful

translations.1: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa huwa lahul asmaa'ul husnaa
translations.2: All<u>a</u>hu l<u>a</u> il<u>a</u>ha ill<u>a</u> huwa lahu alasm<u>a</u>o al<u>h</u>usn<u>a</u>

words.translation: And has|come to you|the narration|(of) Musa

translations.1: Wa-hal ataaka hadeesu Moosa
translations.2: Wahal at<u>a</u>ka <u>h</u>adeethu moos<u>a</u>

words.translation: When|he saw|a fire|then he said|to his family|Stay here|indeed I|[I] perceived|a fire|perhaps I (can)|bring you|therefrom|a burning brand|or|I find|at|the fire|guidance

translations.1: Iz ra-aa naaran faqaala li-ahlihim kusooo inneee aanastu naaral la'alleee aateekum minhaa biqabasin aw ajidu 'alan naari hudaa
translations.2: Ith raa naran faqala liahlihi omkuthoo innee anastu naran laAAallee ateekum minha biqabasin aw ajidu AAala alnnari hudan

words.translation: Then when|he came to it|he was called|O Musa

translations.1: Falammaaa ataahaa noodiya yaa-Moosaa
translations.2: Falamm<u>a</u> at<u>a</u>h<u>a</u> noodiya y<u>a</u> moos<u>a</u>

words.translation: Indeed [I]|I Am|your Lord|so remove|your shoes|Indeed you|(are) in the valley|the sacred|(of) Tuwa

translations.1: Inneee Ana Rabbuka fakhla' na'laika innaka bilwaadil muqaddasi Tuwaa
translations.2: Innee ana rabbuka faikhlaAA naAAlayka innaka bialwadi almuqaddasi tuwan

words.translation: And I|(have) chosen you|so listen|to what|is revealed

translations.1: Wa anakhtartuka fastami' limaa yoohaa
translations.2: Waana ikhtartuka faistamiAA lima yooha

words.translation: Indeed [I]|I Am|Allah|(There is) no|god|but|I|so worship Me|and establish|the prayer|for My remembrance

translations.1: Innaneee Anal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Ana fa'budnee Wa-aqimis salaata lizikree
translations.2: Innanee ana Allahu la ilaha illa ana faoAAbudnee waaqimi alssalata lithikree

words.translation: Indeed|the Hour|(will be) coming|I almost|[I] hide it|that may be recompensed|every|soul|for what|it strives

translations.1: Innas Saa'ata aatiyatun akaadu ukhfeehaa litujzaa kullu nafsin bimaa tas'aa
translations.2: Inna alssaAAata atiyatun akadu okhfeeha litujza kullu nafsin bima tasAAa

words.translation: So (do) not|(let) avert you|from it|(one) who|(does) not|believe|in it|and follows|his desires|lest you perish

translations.1: Falaa yasuddannaka 'anhaa mal laa yu'minu bihaa wattaba'a hawaahu fatardaa
translations.2: Fala yasuddannaka AAanha man la yuminu biha waittabaAAa hawahu fatarda

words.translation: And what|(is) that|in your right hand|O Musa

translations.1: Wa-maa tilka bi-yamee-nika yaa-Moosaa
translations.2: Wam<u>a</u> tilka biyameenika y<u>a</u> moos<u>a</u>

words.translation: He said|It|(is) my staff|I lean|upon it|and I bring down leaves|with it|for|my sheep|and for me|in it|(are) uses|other

translations.1: Qaala hiya 'asaaya atawakka'u alaihaa Wa-ahushshu bihaa 'alaa ghanamee Wa-liya feehaa ma-aaribu ukhraa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la hiya AAa<u>sa</u>ya atawakkao AAalayh<u>a</u> waahushshu bih<u>a</u> AAal<u>a</u> ghanamee waliya feeh<u>a</u> ma<u>a</u>ribu okhr<u>a</u>

words.translation: He said|Throw it down|O Musa!

translations.1: Qaala alqihaa yaa-Moosaa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la alqih<u>a</u> y<u>a</u> moos<u>a</u>

words.translation: So he threw it down|and behold!|It|(was) a snake|moving swiftly

translations.1: Fa-alqaahaa fa-izaa hiya haiyatun tas'aa
translations.2: Faalq<u>a</u>h<u>a</u> fai<u>tha</u> hiya <u>h</u>ayyatun tasAA<u>a</u>

words.translation: He said|Seize it|and (do) not|fear|We will return it|(to) its state|the former

translations.1: Qaala khuzhaa Wa-laa ta-khaf sanu'eeduhaa seeratahal oolaa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la khu<u>th</u>h<u>a</u> wal<u>a</u> takhaf sanuAAeeduh<u>a</u> seeratah<u>a</u> alool<u>a</u>

words.translation: And draw near|your hand|to|your side|it will come out|white|without any|without any|disease|(as) a sign|another

translations.1: Wadmum yadaka ilaa janaahika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'in Aayatan ukhraa
translations.2: Waodmum yadaka ila janahika takhruj baydaa min ghayri sooin ayatan okhra

words.translation: That We may show you|of|Our Signs|the Greatest

translations.1: Linuriyaka min Aayaatinal Kubra
translations.2: Linuriyaka min <u>a</u>y<u>a</u>tin<u>a</u> alkubr<u>a</u>

words.translation: Go|to|Firaun|Indeed he|(has) transgressed

translations.1: Izhab ilaa Fir'awna innahoo taghaa
translations.2: I<u>th</u>hab il<u>a</u> firAAawna innahu <u>t</u>agh<u>a</u>

words.translation: He said|My Lord!|Expand|for me|my breast

translations.1: Qaala Rabbish rah lee sadree
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la rabbi ishra<u>h</u> lee <u>s</u>adree

words.translation: And ease|for me|my task

translations.1: Wa-yassir leee amree
translations.2: Wayassir lee amree

words.translation: And untie|(the) knot|from|my tongue

translations.1: Wahlul 'uqdatan milli saanee
translations.2: Waohlul AAuqdatan min lisanee

words.translation: That they may understand|my speech

translations.1: Yafqahoo qawlee
translations.2: Yafqahoo qawlee

words.translation: And appoint|for me|a minister|from|my family

translations.1: Waj'al lee wazeeran min ahlee
translations.2: WaijAAal lee wazeeran min ahlee

words.translation: Harun|my brother

translations.1: Haaroona akhee
translations.2: H<u>a</u>roona akhee

words.translation: Reinforce|through him|my strength

translations.1: Ushdud biheee azree
translations.2: Oshdud bihi azree

words.translation: And make him share|[in]|my task

translations.1: Wa-ashrik-hu feee amree
translations.2: Waashrikhu fee amree

words.translation: That|we may glorify You|much

translations.1: Kai nusabbihaka kaseeraa
translations.2: Kay nusabbihaka katheeran

words.translation: And [we] remember You|much

translations.1: Wa-nazkuraka kaseeraa
translations.2: Wanathkuraka katheeran

words.translation: Indeed [You]|You are|of us|All-Seer

translations.1: Innaka kunta binaa baseeraa
translations.2: Innaka kunta bina baseeran

words.translation: He said|Verily|you are granted|your request|O Musa!

translations.1: Qaala qad ooteeta su'laka yaa-Moosaa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la qad ooteeta sulaka y<u>a</u> moos<u>a</u>

words.translation: And indeed|We conferred a favor|on you|another time|another time

translations.1: Wa-laqad manannaa 'alaika marratan ukhraaa
translations.2: Walaqad manann<u>a</u> AAalayka marratan okhr<u>a</u>

words.translation: When|We inspired|to|your mother|what|is inspired

translations.1: Iz awhainaaa ilaaa ummika maa yoohaaa
translations.2: I<u>th</u> aw<u>h</u>ayn<u>a</u> il<u>a</u> ommika m<u>a</u> yoo<u>ha</u>

words.translation: That|cast him|in|the chest|then cast it|in|the river|then let cast it|the river|on the bank|will take him|an enemy|to Me|and an enemy|to him."|And I cast|over you|love|from Me|and that you may be brought up|under|My Eye

translations.1: Ani qzifeehi fit Taabooti fa-qzifeehi fil yammi fal-yul-qihil yammu bis-saahili ya'khuzhu 'aduwwul lee Wa-'aduwwul lah; Wa-alqaitu 'alaika mahabbatan minnee Wa-litusna'a 'alaa 'ainee
translations.2: Ani iqthifeehi fee alttabooti faiqthifeehi fee alyammi falyulqihi alyammu bialssahili yakhuthhu AAaduwwun lee waAAaduwwun lahu waalqaytu AAalayka mahabbatan minnee walitusnaAAa AAala AAaynee

words.translation: When|was going|your sister|and she said|Shall|I show you|[to]|(one) who|will nurse and rear him?"|So We returned you|to|your mother|that|may be cooled|her eyes|and not|she grieves|And you killed|a man|but We saved you|from|the distress|and We tried you|(with) a trial|Then you remained|(some) years|with|(the) people|(of) Madyan|Then|you came|at|the decreed (time)|O Musa!

translations.1: Iz tamsheee ukhtuka fataqoolu hal adullukum 'alaa maien yakfuluhoo faraja-'naaka ilaaa ummika kai taqarra 'ainuhaa Wa-laa tahzan; Wa-qatalta nafsan fanajjainaaka minal ghammi Wa-fatannaaka futoonaa; falabista sineena feee ahli Madyana summa ji'ta 'alaa qadarien yaa-Moosa
translations.2: I<u>th</u> tamshee okhtuka fataqoolu hal adullukum AAal<u>a</u> man yakfuluhu farajaAAn<u>a</u>ka il<u>a</u> ommika kay taqarra AAaynuh<u>a</u> wal<u>a</u> ta<u>h</u>zana waqatalta nafsan fanajjayn<u>a</u>ka mina alghammi wafatann<u>a</u>ka futoonan falabithta sineena fee ahli madyana thumma jita AAal<u>a</u> qadarin y<u>a</u> moos<u>a</u>

words.translation: And I (have) chosen you|for Myself

translations.1: Wastana'-tuka linafsee
translations.2: WaistanaAAtuka linafsee

words.translation: Go|you|and your brother|with My Signs|and (do) not|slacken|in|My remembrance

translations.1: Izhab anta Wa-akhooka bi-Aayaatee Wa-laa taniyaa fee zikree
translations.2: I<u>th</u>hab anta waakhooka bi<u>a</u>y<u>a</u>tee wal<u>a</u> taniy<u>a</u> fee <u>th</u>ikree

words.translation: Go both of you|to|Firaun|Indeed he|(has) transgressed

translations.1: Izhabaaa ilaa Fir'awna innahoo taghaa
translations.2: I<u>th</u>hab<u>a</u> il<u>a</u> firAAawna innahu <u>t</u>agh<u>a</u>

words.translation: And speak|to him|a word|gentle|perhaps he|may take heed|or|fear

translations.1: Faqoolaa lahoo qawlal laiyinal la-allahoo yatazakkkaru 'aw yakhshaa
translations.2: Faqool<u>a</u> lahu qawlan layyinan laAAallahu yata<u>th</u>akkaru aw yakhsh<u>a</u>

words.translation: They said|Our Lord!|Indeed we|fear|that|he will hasten|against us|or|that|he will transgress

translations.1: Qaalaa Rabbanaaa innanaa nakhaafu aien yafruta 'alainaaa aw ai yatghaa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>l<u>a</u> rabban<u>a</u> innan<u>a</u> nakh<u>a</u>fu an yafru<u>t</u>a AAalayn<u>a</u> aw an ya<u>t</u>gh<u>a</u>

words.translation: He said|(Do) not|fear|Indeed I Am|with you both|I hear|and I see

translations.1: Qaala laa takhaafaaa innanee ma'akumaa asma'u Wa-araa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la l<u>a</u> takh<u>a</u>f<u>a</u> innanee maAAakum<u>a</u> asmaAAu waar<u>a</u>

words.translation: So go to him|and say|Indeed, we|both (are) Messengers|(of) your Lord|so send|with us|(the) Children of Israel|(the) Children of Israel|and (do) not|torment them|Verily|we came to you|with a Sign|from|your Lord|And peace|on|(one) who|follows|the Guidance

translations.1: Faatiyaahu faqoolaaa innaa Rasoolaa Rabbika fa-arsil ma'anaa Banee Israaa'eela Wa-laa tu'azzibhum qad ji'naaka bi-Aayatim mir Rabbika wassa-laamu 'alaa manit taba'al hudaa
translations.2: Fatiyahu faqoola inna rasoola rabbika faarsil maAAana banee israeela wala tuAAaththibhum qad jinaka biayatin min rabbika waalssalamu AAala mani ittabaAAa alhuda

words.translation: Indeed we|verily|it has been revealed|to us|that|the punishment|(will be) on|(one) who|denies|and turns away."

translations.1: Innaa qad oohiya ilainaaa annnal 'azaaba 'alaa man kaz-zaba Wa-tawalla
translations.2: Inn<u>a</u> qad oo<u>h</u>iya ilayn<u>a</u> anna alAAa<u>tha</u>ba AAal<u>a</u> man ka<u>thth</u>aba watawall<u>a</u>

words.translation: He said|Then who|(is) your Lord|O Musa

translations.1: Qaala famar Rabbu-kumaa yaa-Moosa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la faman rabbukum<u>a</u> y<u>a</u> moos<u>a</u>

words.translation: He said|Our Lord|(is) the One Who|gave|(to) every|thing|its form|then|He guided (it)

translations.1: Qaala Rabbunal lazeee a'taa kulla shai'in khalqahoo summa hadaa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la rabbun<u>a</u> alla<u>th</u>ee aAA<u>ta</u> kulla shayin khalqahu thumma had<u>a</u>

words.translation: He said|Then what|(is the) case|(of) the generations|(of) the former

translations.1: Qaala famaa baalul quroonil oolaa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la fam<u>a</u> b<u>a</u>lu alqurooni alool<u>a</u>

words.translation: He said|Its knowledge|(is) with|my Lord|in|a Record|Not|errs|my Lord|and not|forgets

translations.1: Qaala 'ilmuhaa 'inda Rabee fee kitaab, laa yadillu Rabbee Wa-laa yansaa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la AAilmuh<u>a</u> AAinda rabbee fee kit<u>a</u>bin l<u>a</u> ya<u>d</u>illu rabbee wal<u>a</u> yans<u>a</u>

words.translation: The One Who|made|for you|the earth|(as) a bed|and inserted|for you|therein|ways|and sent down|from|the sky|water|then We (have) brought forth|with it|pairs|of|plants|diverse

translations.1: Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda mahdanw Wa-salaka lakum feehaa subulanw Wa-anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-akhrajnaa biheee azwaajam min nabaatin shatta
translations.2: Allathee jaAAala lakumu alarda mahdan wasalaka lakum feeha subulan waanzala mina alssamai maan faakhrajna bihi azwajan min nabatin shatta

words.translation: Eat|and pasture|your cattle|Indeed|in|that|surely (are) Signs|for possessors|(of) intelligence

translations.1: Kuloo war'aw an'aamakum; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil li-ulin nuhaa
translations.2: Kuloo wairAAaw anAAamakum inna fee thalika laayatin liolee alnnuha

words.translation: From it|We created you|and in it|We will return you|and from it|We will bring you out|time|another

translations.1: Minhaa khalaqnaakum Wa-feehaa nu'eedukum Wa-minhaa nukhrijukum taaratan ukhraa
translations.2: Minh<u>a</u> khalaqn<u>a</u>kum wafeeh<u>a</u> nuAAeedukum waminh<u>a</u> nukhrijukum t<u>a</u>ratan okhr<u>a</u>

words.translation: And verily|We showed him|Our Signs|all of them|but he denied|and refused

translations.1: Wa-laqad arainaahu Aayaatinaa kullahaa fakaz-zaba Wa-abaa
translations.2: Walaqad arayn<u>a</u>hu <u>a</u>y<u>a</u>tin<u>a</u> kullah<u>a</u> faka<u>thth</u>aba waab<u>a</u>

words.translation: He said|Have you come to us|to drive us out|of|our land|with your magic|O Musa

translations.1: Qaala aji'tanaa litukhri-janaa min ardinaa bisihrika yaa-Moosa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la ajitan<u>a</u> litukhrijan<u>a</u> min ar<u>d</u>in<u>a</u> bisi<u>h</u>rika y<u>a</u> moos<u>a</u>

words.translation: Then we will surely produce for you|magic|like it|So make|between us|and between you|an appointment|not|we will fail it|[we]|and not|you|(in) a place|even

translations.1: Falanaatiyannaka bisihrim mislihee faj'al bainanaa Wa-bainaka maw'idal laa nukhlifuhoo nahnu Wa-laaa anta makaanan suwaa
translations.2: Falanatiyannaka bisihrin mithlihi faijAAal baynana wabaynaka mawAAidan la nukhlifuhu nahnu wala anta makanan suwan

words.translation: He said|Your appointment|(is on the) day|(of) the festival|and that|will be assembled|the people|(at) forenoon

translations.1: Qaala maw'idukum yawmuz zeenati Wa-ai yuhsharan naasu duhaa
translations.2: Qala mawAAidukum yawmu alzzeenati waan yuhshara alnnasu duhan

words.translation: Then went away|Firaun|and put together|his plan|then|came

translations.1: Fatawallaa Fir'awnu fajjama'a kaidahoo summa ataa
translations.2: Fatawall<u>a</u> firAAawnu fajamaAAa kaydahu thumma at<u>a</u>

words.translation: Said|to them|Musa|Woe to you!|(Do) not|invent|against|Allah|a lie|lest He will destroy you|with a punishment|And verily|he failed|who|invented

translations.1: Qaala lahum Moosaa wailakum laa taftaroo 'alal laahi kaziban fa-yus-hitakum bi-'azaab, Wa-qad khaaba manif taraa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la lahum moos<u>a</u> waylakum l<u>a</u> taftaroo AAal<u>a</u> All<u>a</u>hi ka<u>th</u>iban fayus<u>h</u>itakum biAAa<u>tha</u>bin waqad kh<u>a</u>ba mani iftar<u>a</u>

words.translation: Then they disputed|(in) their affair|among them|and they kept secret|the private conversation

translations.1: Fatanaaza'ooo amrahum bainahum Wa-asarrun najwaa
translations.2: FatanazaAAoo amrahum baynahum waasarroo alnnajwa

words.translation: They said|Indeed|these two|[two] magicians|they intend|that|they drive you out|of|your land|with their magic|and do away|with your way|the exemplary

translations.1: Qaalooo in haaazaani lasaahiraani yureedaani aien yukhrijaakum min ardikum bisihrihimaa Wa-yazhabaa bitareeqatikumul muslaa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>loo in h<u>atha</u>ni las<u>ah</u>ir<u>a</u>ni yureed<u>a</u>ni an yukhrij<u>a</u>kum min ar<u>d</u>ikum bisi<u>h</u>rihim<u>a</u> waya<u>th</u>hab<u>a</u> bi<u>t</u>areeqatikumu almuthl<u>a</u>

words.translation: So put together|your plan|then|come|(in) a line|And verily|(will be) successful|today|who|overcomes

translations.1: Fa-ajmi'oo kaidakum summa' too saffaa; Wa-qad aflahal yawma manis ta'laa
translations.2: FaajmiAAoo kaydakum thumma itoo <u>s</u>affan waqad afla<u>h</u>a alyawma mani istaAAl<u>a</u>

words.translation: They said|O Musa!|Either|[that]|you throw|or|[that]|we will be|the first|who|throws

translations.1: Qaaloo yaa-Moosaaa immaaa an tulqiya Wa-immaaa an nakoona awala man alqaa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>loo y<u>a</u> moos<u>a</u> imm<u>a</u> an tulqiya waimm<u>a</u> an nakoona awwala man alq<u>a</u>

words.translation: He said|Nay|you throw|Then behold!|Their ropes|and their staffs|seemed|to him|by|their magic|that they|(were) moving

translations.1: Qaala bal alqoo fa-izaa hibaaluhum Wa-'isiyyuhum yukhaiyalu ilaihi min sihrihim annahaa tas'aa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la bal alqoo fai<u>tha</u> <u>h</u>ib<u>a</u>luhum waAAi<u>s</u>iyyuhum yukhayyalu ilayhi min si<u>h</u>rihim annah<u>a</u> tasAA<u>a</u>

words.translation: So sensed|in|himself|a fear|Musa

translations.1: Fa-awjasa fee nafsihee kheefatam Moosa
translations.2: Faawjasa fee nafsihi kheefatan moos<u>a</u>

words.translation: We said|(Do) not|fear|Indeed you|you|(will be) superior

translations.1: Qulnaa laa takhaf innaka antal a'laa
translations.2: Quln<u>a</u> l<u>a</u> takhaf innaka anta alaAAl<u>a</u>

words.translation: And throw|what|(is) in|your right hand|it will swallow up|what|they have made|Only|they (have) made|a trick|(of) a magician|and not|will be successful|the magician|wherever|he comes

translations.1: Wa-alqi maa fee yamee-nika talqaf maa sana'oo; innamaa sana'oo kaidu saahir; Wa-laa yuflihus saahiru haisu ataa
translations.2: Waalqi ma fee yameenika talqaf ma sanaAAoo innama sanaAAoo kaydu sahirin wala yuflihu alssahiru haythu ata

words.translation: So were thrown down|the magicians|prostrating|They said|We believe|in (the) Lord|(of) Harun|and Musa

translations.1: Fa-ulqiyas saharatu sujjadan qaalooo aamannaa bi-Rabbi Haaroona Wa-Moosa
translations.2: Faolqiya alssaharatu sujjadan qaloo amanna birabbi haroona wamoosa

words.translation: He said|You believe|[to] him|before|[that]|I gave permission|to you|Indeed he|(is) your chief|the one who|taught you|the magic|So surely I will cut off|your hands|and your feet|of|opposite sides|and surely I will crucify you|on|(the) trunks|(of) date-palms|and surely you will know|which of us|(is) more severe|(in) punishment|and more lasting

translations.1: Qaala aamantum lahoo qabla an aazana lakum; innahoo lakabeerukumul lazee 'allama-kumus sihra fala-uqatti'anna aidiyakum Wa-arjulakum min khilaafinw Wa-la-usallibannakum fee juzoo'in nakhli Wa-lata'lamunna aiyunaaa ashaddu 'azaabanw Wa-abqaa
translations.2: Qala amantum lahu qabla an athana lakum innahu lakabeerukumu allathee AAallamakumu alssihra falaoqattiAAanna aydiyakum waarjulakum min khilafin walaosallibannakum fee juthooAAi alnnakhli walataAAlamunna ayyuna ashaddu AAathaban waabqa

words.translation: They said|Never|we will prefer you|over|what|has come to us|of|the clear proofs|and the One Who|created us|So decree|whatever|you|(are) decreeing|Only|you can decree|(for) this|life|(of) the world

translations.1: Qaaloo lan nu'siraka 'alaa maa jaaa'anaa minal baiyinaati wallazee fataranaa faqdi maaa anta qaad; innamaa taqdee haazihil hayaatad dunyaa
translations.2: Qaloo lan nuthiraka AAala ma jaana mina albayyinati waallathee fatarana faiqdi ma anta qadin innama taqdee hathihi alhayata alddunya

words.translation: Indeed [we]|we believe|in our Lord|that He may forgive|for us|our sins|and what|you compelled us|on it|of|the magic|And Allah|(is) Best|and Ever Lasting

translations.1: Innaaa aamannaa bi-Rabbinaa liyaghfira lanaa khataayaanaa Wa-maaa akrahtanaa 'alaihi minas sihr; wallaahu khairunw Wa-abqaa
translations.2: Inna amanna birabbina liyaghfira lana khatayana wama akrahtana AAalayhi mina alssihri waAllahu khayrun waabqa

words.translation: Indeed he|who|comes|(to) his Lord|(as) a criminal|then indeed|for him|(is) Hell|Not|he will die|in it|and not|live

translations.1: Innahoo mai ya'ti Rabbahoo mujriman fa-inna lahoo Jahannama laa yamootu feehaa Wa-laa yahyaa
translations.2: Innahu man yati rabbahu mujriman fainna lahu jahannama l<u>a</u> yamootu feeh<u>a</u> wal<u>a</u> ya<u>h</u>y<u>a</u>

words.translation: But whoever|comes to Him|(as) a believer|verily|he has done|the righteous deeds|then those|for them|(will be) the ranks|[the] high

translations.1: Wa-main ya'tihee mu'minan qad 'amilas saalihaati fa-ulaaa'ika lahumud darajaatul 'ulaa
translations.2: Waman yatihi muminan qad AAamila alssalihati faolaika lahumu alddarajatu alAAula

words.translation: Gardens|(of) Eden|flows|from|underneath them|the rivers|abiding forever|in it|And that|(is) the reward|(for him) who|purifies himself

translations.1: Jannaatu 'Adnin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; Wa-zaalika jazaaa'u man tazakka
translations.2: Jann<u>a</u>tu AA<u>a</u>dnin tajree min ta<u>h</u>tih<u>a</u> alanh<u>a</u>ru kh<u>a</u>lideena feeh<u>a</u> wa<u>tha</u>lika jaz<u>a</u>o man tazakk<u>a</u>

words.translation: And verily|We inspired|to|Musa|that|Travel by night|with My slaves|and strike|for them|a path|in|the sea|dry|not|fearing|to be overtaken|and not|being afraid

translations.1: Wa-laqad awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa an asri bi'ibaadee fadrib lahum tareeqan fil bahri yabasal laa takhaafu darakanw Wa-laa takhshaa
translations.2: Walaqad awhayna ila moosa an asri biAAibadee faidrib lahum tareeqan fee albahri yabasan la takhafu darakan wala takhsha

words.translation: Then followed them|Firaun|with his forces|but covered them|from|the sea|what|covered them

translations.1: Fa-atba'ahum Fir'awnu bijunoodihee faghashiyahum minal yammmi maa ghashi-yahum
translations.2: FaatbaAAahum firAAawnu bijunoodihi faghashiyahum mina alyammi m<u>a</u> ghashiyahum

words.translation: And led astray|Firaun|his people|and (did) not|guide them

translations.1: wa-adalla fir'awnu qawmahoo Wa-maa hadaa
translations.2: Waa<u>d</u>alla firAAawnu qawmahu wam<u>a</u> had<u>a</u>

words.translation: O Children of Israel|O Children of Israel|Verily|We delivered you|from|your enemy|and We made a covenant with you|on (the) side|(of) the Mount|the right|and We sent down|to you|the Manna|and the quails

translations.1: Yaa-Baneee Israaa'eela qad anjainaakum min 'aduw-wikum Wa-wa'adnaakum jaanibat Tooril aimana Wa-nazzalnaa 'alaikumul Manna was-Salwaa
translations.2: Ya banee israeela qad anjaynakum min AAaduwwikum wawaAAadnakum janiba alttoori alaymana wanazzalna AAalaykumu almanna waalssalwa

words.translation: Eat|of|(the) good things|which|We have provided you|and (do) not|transgress|therein|lest should descend|upon you|My Anger|And whoever|on whom descends|on whom descends|My Anger|indeed|he (has) perished

translations.1: Kuloo min taiyibaati maa razaqnaakum Wa-laa tatghaw feehi fa-yahilla 'alaikum ghadabee Wa-mai yahlil 'alaihi ghadabee faqad hawaa
translations.2: Kuloo min <u>t</u>ayyib<u>a</u>ti m<u>a</u> razaqn<u>a</u>kum wal<u>a</u> ta<u>t</u>ghaw feehi faya<u>h</u>illa AAalaykum gha<u>d</u>abee waman ya<u>h</u>lil AAalayhi gha<u>d</u>abee faqad haw<u>a</u>

words.translation: But indeed I Am|the Perpetual Forgiver|of whoever|repents|and believes|and does|righteous (deeds)|then|remains guided

translations.1: Wa-innee la-Ghaffaarul liman taaba Wa-aamana Wa-'amila saalihan summah tadaa
translations.2: Wainnee laghaff<u>a</u>run liman t<u>a</u>ba wa<u>a</u>mana waAAamila <u>sa</u>li<u>h</u>an thumma ihtad<u>a</u>

words.translation: And what|made you hasten|from|your people|O Musa

translations.1: Wa-maaa a'jalaka 'an qawmika yaa-Moosa
translations.2: Wam<u>a</u> aAAjalaka AAan qawmika y<u>a</u> moos<u>a</u>

words.translation: He said|They|(are) close|upon|my tracks|and I hastened|to you|my Lord|that You be pleased

translations.1: Qaala hum ulaaa'i 'alaaa asaree Wa-'ajiltu ilaika Rabbi litardaa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la hum ol<u>a</u>i AAal<u>a</u> atharee waAAajiltu ilayka rabbi litar<u>da</u>

words.translation: He said|But indeed, We|[verily]|We (have) tried|your people|after you|after you|and has led them astray|the Samiri

translations.1: Qaala fa-innaa qad fatannaa qawmaka mim ba'dika Wa-adallahumus Saamiriyy
translations.2: Qala fainna qad fatanna qawmaka min baAAdika waadallahumu alssamiriyyu

words.translation: Then Musa returned|Then Musa returned|to|his people|angry|(and) sorrowful|He said|O my people|Did not|promise you|your Lord|a promise|good|Then, did seem long|to you|the promise|or|did you desire|that|descend|upon you|(the) Anger|of|your Lord|so you broke|(the) promise to me

translations.1: Faraja'a Moosaaa ilaa qawmihee ghadbaana asifaa; qaala yaa-qawmi alam ya'idkum Rabbukum wa'dan hasanaa; afataala 'alaikumul 'ahdu am arattum ai yahilla 'alaikum ghadabum mir Rabbikum fa-akhlaftum maw'idee
translations.2: FarajaAAa moos<u>a</u> il<u>a</u> qawmihi gha<u>d</u>b<u>a</u>na asifan q<u>a</u>la y<u>a</u> qawmi alam yaAAidkum rabbukum waAAdan <u>h</u>asanan afa<u>ta</u>la AAalaykumu alAAahdu am aradtum an ya<u>h</u>illa AAalaykum gha<u>d</u>abun min rabbikum faakhlaftum mawAAidee

words.translation: They said|Not|we broke|promise to you|by our will|but we|[we] were made to carry|burdens|from|ornaments|(of) the people|so we threw them|and thus|threw|the Samiri

translations.1: Qaaloo maaa akhlafnaa maw'idaka bimalkinna Wa-laakinna hummilnaaa awzaaram min zeenatil qawmi faqazafnaahaa fakazaalika alqas Saamiriyy
translations.2: Qaloo ma akhlafna mawAAidaka bimalkina walakinna hummilna awzaran min zeenati alqawmi faqathafnaha fakathalika alqa alssamiriyyu

words.translation: Then he brought forth|for them|NULL|body|it had|a lowing sound|and they said|This|(is) your god|and the god|(of) Musa|but he forgot

translations.1: Fa-akhraja lahum 'ijlan jasadal lahoo khuwaarun faqaaloo haazaaa ilaahukum Wa-ilaahu Moosaa fanasee
translations.2: Faakhraja lahum AAijlan jasadan lahu khuwarun faqaloo hatha ilahukum wailahu moosa fanasiya

words.translation: Then did not|they see|that not|it (could) return|to them|a word|and not|possess|for them|any harm|and not|any benefit

translations.1: Afalaa yarawna allaa yarji'u ilaihim qawlanw Wa-laa yamliku lahum darranw Wa-laa naf'aa
translations.2: Afala yarawna alla yarjiAAu ilayhim qawlan wala yamliku lahum darran wala nafAAan

words.translation: And verily|(had) said|to them|Harun|before|before|O my people|Only|you are being tested|by it|and indeed|your Lord|(is) the Most Gracious|so follow me|and obey|my order

translations.1: Wa-laqad qaala lahum Haaroonu min qablu yaa-qawmi innamaa futintum bihee Wa-inna Rabbakumur Rahmaanu fattabi'oonee Wa-atee'ooo amree
translations.2: Walaqad qala lahum haroonu min qablu ya qawmi innama futintum bihi wainna rabbakumu alrrahmanu faittabiAAoonee waateeAAoo amree

words.translation: They said|Never|we will cease|being devoted to it|being devoted to it|until|returns|to us|Musa

translations.1: Qaaloo lan nabraha 'alaihi 'aakifeena hattaa yarji'a ilainaa Moosaa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>loo lan nabra<u>h</u>a AAalayhi AA<u>a</u>kifeena <u>h</u>att<u>a</u> yarjiAAa ilayn<u>a</u> moos<u>a</u>

words.translation: He said|O Harun!|What|prevented you|when|you saw them|going astray

translations.1: Qaala Yaa-Haaroonu maa mana-'aka iz ra-aitahum dallooo
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la y<u>a</u> h<u>a</u>roonu m<u>a</u> manaAAaka i<u>th</u> raaytahum <u>d</u>alloo

words.translation: That not|you follow me|Then have you disobeyed|my order

translations.1: Allaa tattabi'ani afa'asaita amree
translations.2: All<u>a</u> tattabiAAani afaAAa<u>s</u>ayta amree

words.translation: He said|O son of my mother|(Do) not|seize (me)|by my beard|and not|by my head|Indeed, I|[I] feared|that|you would say|You caused division|between|(the) Children of Israel|(the) Children of Israel|and not|you respect|my word

translations.1: Qaala yabna'umma laa ta'khuz bi-lihyatee Wa-laa bi-ra'see innee khasheetu an taqoola farraqta baina Baneee Israaa'eela Wa-lam tarqub qawlee
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la ya bna omma l<u>a</u> takhu<u>th</u> bili<u>h</u>yatee wal<u>a</u> birasee innee khasheetu an taqoola farraqta bayna banee isr<u>a</u>eela walam tarqub qawlee

words.translation: He said|Then what|(is) your case|O Samiri

translations.1: Qaala famaa khatbuka yaa-Saamiriyy
translations.2: Qala fama khatbuka ya samiriyyu

words.translation: He said|I perceived|what|not|they perceive|in it|so I took|a handful|from|(the) track|(of) the Messenger|then threw it|and thus|suggested|to me|my soul

translations.1: Qaala basurtu bimaa lam yabsuroo bihee faqabadtu qabdatam min asarir Rasooli fanabaztuhaa Wa-kazaalika sawwalat lee nafsee
translations.2: Qala basurtu bima lam yabsuroo bihi faqabadtu qabdatan min athari alrrasooli fanabathtuha wakathalika sawwalat lee nafsee

words.translation: He said|Then go|And indeed|for you|in|the life|that|you will say|(Do) not|touch."|And indeed|for you|(is) an appointment|never|you will fail to (keep) it|And look|at|your god|that which|you have remained|to it|devoted|Surely we will burn it|then|certainly we will scatter it|in|the sea|(in) particles

translations.1: Qaala fazhab fa-inna laka fil hayaati an taqoola laa misaasa Wa-inna laka maw'idal lan tukhlafahoo wanzur ilaaa ilaahikal lazee zalta 'alaihi 'aakifaa; la-nuharriqannahoo thumma la-nansifannahoo fil yammi nasfaa
translations.2: Qala faithhab fainna laka fee alhayati an taqoola la misasa wainna laka mawAAidan lan tukhlafahu waonthur ila ilahika allathee thalta AAalayhi AAakifan lanuharriqannahu thumma lanansifannahu fee alyammi nasfan

words.translation: Only|your God|(is) Allah|the One|(there is) no|god|but|He|He has encompassed|all|things|(in) knowledge

translations.1: Innamaaa ilaahu-kumul laahul lazee laa ilaaha illaa Hoo; wasi'a kulla shai'in ilmaa
translations.2: Innama ilahukumu Allahu allathee la ilaha illa huwa wasiAAa kulla shayin AAilman

words.translation: Thus|We relate|to you|from|(the) news|(of) what|has preceded|has preceded|And certainly|We have given you|from|Us|a Reminder

translations.1: Kazaalika naqussu 'alaika min anbaaa'i maa qad sabaq; Wa-qad aatainaaka mil ladunnaa Zikraa
translations.2: Kathalika naqussu AAalayka min anbai ma qad sabaqa waqad ataynaka min ladunna thikran

words.translation: Whoever|turns away|from it|then indeed he|will bear|(on the) Day|(of) Resurrection|a burden

translations.1: Man a'rada 'anhu, fa-innahoo yahmilu Yawmal Qiyaamati wizraa
translations.2: Man aAArada AAanhu fainnahu yahmilu yawma alqiyamati wizran

words.translation: Abiding forever|in it|and evil|for them|(on the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|(as) a load

translations.1: Khaalideena feehi Wa-saaa'a lahum Yawmal Qiyaamati himlaa
translations.2: Khalideena feehi wasaa lahum yawma alqiyamati himlan

words.translation: (The) Day|will be blown|in|the Trumpet|and We will gather|the criminals|that Day|blue-eyed

translations.1: Yawma yunfakhu fissoori Wa-nahshurul mujrimeena Yawma 'izin zurqaa
translations.2: Yawma yunfakhu fee alssoori wanahshuru almujrimeena yawmaithin zurqan

words.translation: They are murmuring|among themselves|Not|you remained|except (for)|ten

translations.1: Yatakhaafatoona bainahum il labistum illaa 'ashraa
translations.2: Yatakhafatoona baynahum in labithtum illa AAashran

words.translation: We|know best|what|they will say|when|will say|(the) best of them|(in) conduct|Not|you remained|except (for)|a day

translations.1: nahnu a'lamu bimaa yaqooloona iz yaqoolu amsaluhum tareeqatan il labistum illaa yawmaa
translations.2: Nahnu aAAlamu bima yaqooloona ith yaqoolu amthaluhum tareeqatan in labithtum illa yawman

words.translation: And they ask you|about|the mountains|so say|Will blast them|my Lord|(into) particles

translations.1: Wa-yas'aloonaka 'anil jibaali faqul yansifuhaa Rabbee nasfaa
translations.2: Wayasaloonaka AAani aljibali faqul yansifuha rabbee nasfan

words.translation: Then He will leave it|a level|plain

translations.1: Fa-yazaruhaa qaa'an safsafaa
translations.2: Fayatharuha qaAAan safsafan

words.translation: Not|you will see|in it|any crookedness|and not|any curve

translations.1: Laa taraa feehaa 'iwajanw Wa-laaa amtaa
translations.2: La tara feeha AAiwajan wala amtan

words.translation: On that Day|they will follow|the caller|no|deviation|from it|And (will be) humbled|the voices|for the Most Gracious|so not|you will hear|except|a faint sound

translations.1: Yawma-izien yattabi'oonad daa'iya laa 'iwaja lahoo Wa-khasha'atil aswaatu lir-Rahmaani falaa tasma'u illaa hamsaa
translations.2: Yawmaithin yattabiAAoona alddaAAiya la AAiwaja lahu wakhashaAAati alaswatu lilrrahmani fala tasmaAAu illa hamsan

words.translation: (On) that Day|not|will benefit|the intercession|except|(to) whom|has given permission|[to him]|the Most Gracious|and He has accepted|for him|a word

translations.1: Yawma-'izil laa tanfa'ush shafaa'atu illaa man azina lahur Rahmaanu Wa-radiya lahoo qawlaa
translations.2: Yawmaithin la tanfaAAu alshshafaAAatu illa man athina lahu alrrahmanu waradiya lahu qawlan

words.translation: He knows|what|(is) before them|(is) before them|and what|(is) behind them|while not|they encompass|it|(in) knowledge

translations.1: Ya'lamu maa bainaa aideehim Wa-maa khalfahum Wa-laa yuheetoona bihee 'ilmaa
translations.2: YaAAlamu ma bayna aydeehim wama khalfahum wala yuheetoona bihi AAilman

words.translation: And (will be) humbled|the faces|before the Ever-Living|the Self-Subsisting|And verily|will have failed|(he) who|carried|wrongdoing

translations.1: Wa-'anatil wujoohu lil-Haiiyil Qaiyoomi Wa-qad khaaba man hamala zulmaa
translations.2: WaAAanati alwujoohu lilhayyi alqayyoomi waqad khaba man hamala thulman

words.translation: But (he) who|does|of|the righteous deeds|while he|(is) a believer|then not|he will fear|injustice|and not|deprivation

translations.1: Wa-main ya'mal minas saalihaati Wa-huwa mu'minun falaa yakhaafu zulmanw Wa-laa hadmaa
translations.2: Waman yaAAmal mina alssalihati wahuwa muminun fala yakhafu thulman wala hadman

words.translation: And thus|We have sent it down|(the) Quran|(in) Arabic|and We have explained|in it|of|the warnings|that they may|fear|or|it may cause|[for] them|remembrance

translations.1: Wa-kazaalika anzalnaahu Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyanw Wa-sarrafnaa fee-hi minal wa'eedi la'allahum yattaqoona aw yuhdisu lahum zikraa
translations.2: Wakathalika anzalnahu quranan AAarabiyyan wasarrafna feehi mina alwaAAeedi laAAallahum yattaqoona aw yuhdithu lahum thikran

words.translation: So high (above all)|(is) Allah|the King|the True|And (do) not|hasten|with the Quran|before|before|[that]|is completed|to you|its revelation|and say|My Lord|Increase me|(in) knowledge

translations.1: Fata'aalal laahul Malikul Haqq; Wa-laa ta'jal bil-Quraani min qabli aien yuqdaaa ilaika wahyuhoo Wa-qur Rabbi zidnee 'ilmaa
translations.2: FataAAala Allahu almaliku alhaqqu wala taAAjal bialqurani min qabli an yuqda ilayka wahyuhu waqul rabbi zidnee AAilman

words.translation: And verily|We made a covenant|with|Adam|before|before|but he forgot|and not|We found|in him|determination

translations.1: Wa-laqad 'ahidnaaa ilaaa Aadama min qablu fanasiya Wa-lam najid lahoo 'azmaa
translations.2: Walaqad AAahidna ila adama min qablu fanasiya walam najid lahu AAazman

words.translation: And when|We said|to the Angels|Prostrate|to Adam|then they prostrated|except|Iblis|he refused

translations.1: Wa-iz qulnaa lilma-laaa'ikatis judoo li-Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa; abaa
translations.2: Wai<u>th</u> quln<u>a</u> lilmal<u>a</u>ikati osjudoo li<u>a</u>dama fasajadoo ill<u>a</u> ibleesa ab<u>a</u>

words.translation: Then We said|O Adam!|Indeed|this|(is) an enemy|to you|and to your wife|So not|(let) him drive you both|from|Paradise|so (that) you would suffer

translations.1: Faqulnaa yaaa-Aadamu inna haazaa 'aduwwul laka Wa-lizawjika falaa yukhrijan-nakumaa minal Jannati fatashqaa
translations.2: Faquln<u>a</u> y<u>a</u> <u>a</u>damu inna h<u>atha</u> AAaduwwun laka walizawjika fal<u>a</u> yukhrijannakum<u>a</u> mina aljannati fatashq<u>a</u>

words.translation: Indeed|for you|that not|you will be hungry|therein|and not|you will be unclothed

translations.1: Innaa laka allaa tajoo'a feeha Wa-laa ta'raa
translations.2: Inna laka all<u>a</u> tajooAAa feeh<u>a</u> wal<u>a</u> taAAr<u>a</u>

words.translation: And that you|not|will suffer from thirst|therein|and not|NULL

translations.1: Wa-annaka laa tazma'u feehaa Wa-laa tadhaa
translations.2: Waannaka la tathmao feeha wala tadha

words.translation: Then whispered|to him|Shaitaan|he said|O Adam!|Shall|I direct you|to|(the) tree|(of) the Eternity|and a kingdom|not|(that will) deteriorate

translations.1: Fa-waswasa ilaihish Shaitaanu qaala yaaa-Aadamu hal adulluka 'alaa shajaratil khuldi Wa-mulkil laa yablaa
translations.2: Fawaswasa ilayhi alshshaytanu qala ya adamu hal adulluka AAala shajarati alkhuldi wamulkin la yabla

words.translation: Then they both ate|from it|so became apparent|to them|their shame|and they began|(to) fasten|on themselves|from|(the) leaves|(of) Paradise|And Adam disobeyed|And Adam disobeyed|his Lord|and erred

translations.1: Fa-akalaa minhaa fabadat lahumaa saw-aatuhumaa Wa-tafiqaa yakhsifaani 'alaihimaa minw waraqil jannah; Wa-'asaaa Aadamu Rabbahoo faghawaa
translations.2: Faakal<u>a</u> minh<u>a</u> fabadat lahum<u>a</u> saw<u>a</u>tuhum<u>a</u> wa<u>t</u>afiq<u>a</u> yakh<u>s</u>if<u>a</u>ni AAalayhim<u>a</u> min waraqi aljannati waAAa<u>sa</u> <u>a</u>damu rabbahu faghaw<u>a</u>

words.translation: Then|chose him|his Lord|and turned|to him|and guided (him)

translations.1: Summaj tabbahu Rabbuhoo fataaba 'alaihi Wa-hadaa
translations.2: Thumma ijtab<u>a</u>hu rabbuhu fat<u>a</u>ba AAalayhi wahad<u>a</u>

words.translation: He said|Go down|from it|all|some of you|to others|(as) enemy|Then if|comes to you|from Me|guidance|then whoever|follows|My guidance|then not|he will go astray|and not|suffer

translations.1: Qaalah bita minhaa jamee'am ba'dukum liba'din 'aduww; fa-immaa ya'tiyannakum minnee hudan famanit taba'a hudaaya falaa yadillu Wa-laa yashqaa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la ihbi<u>ta</u> minh<u>a</u> jameeAAan baAA<u>d</u>ukum libaAA<u>d</u>in AAaduwwun faimm<u>a</u> yatiyannakum minnee hudan famani ittabaAAa hud<u>a</u>ya fal<u>a</u> ya<u>d</u>illu wal<u>a</u> yashq<u>a</u>

words.translation: And whoever|turns away|from|My remembrance|then indeed|for him|(is) a life|straitened|and We will gather him|(on the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|blind

translations.1: Wa-man a'rada 'an Zikree fa-inna lahoo ma'eeshatan dankanw Wa-nahshuruhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati a'maa
translations.2: Waman aAArada AAan thikree fainna lahu maAAeeshatan dankan wanahshuruhu yawma alqiyamati aAAman

words.translation: He will say|My Lord!|Why|You raised me|blind|while [verily]|I had|sight

translations.1: Qaala Rabbi lima hashar-tanee a'maa Wa-qad kuntu baseeraa
translations.2: Qala rabbi lima hashartanee aAAma waqad kuntu baseeran

words.translation: He will say|Thus|came to you|Our Signs|but you forgot them|and thus|today|you will be forgotten

translations.1: Qaala kazaalika atatka Aayaatunaa fanaseetahaa Wa-kazaalikal Yawma tunsaa
translations.2: Q<u>a</u>la ka<u>tha</u>lika atatka <u>a</u>y<u>a</u>tun<u>a</u> fanaseetah<u>a</u> waka<u>tha</u>lika alyawma tuns<u>a</u>

words.translation: And thus|We recompense|(he) who|transgresses|and not|believes|in (the) Signs|(of) his Lord|And surely (the) punishment|(of) the Hereafter|(is) more severe|and more lasting

translations.1: Wa-kazaalika najzee man asrafa Wa-lam yu'min bi-Aayaati Rabbih; Wa-la'azaabul Aakhirati ashaddu Wa-abqaa
translations.2: Waka<u>tha</u>lika najzee man asrafa walam yumin bi<u>a</u>y<u>a</u>ti rabbihi walaAAa<u>tha</u>bu al<u>a</u>khirati ashaddu waabq<u>a</u>

words.translation: Then has not|it guided|[for] them|how many|We (have) destroyed|before them|of|the generations|(as) they walk|in|their dwellings|Indeed|in|that|surely (are) Signs|for possessors|(of) intelligence

translations.1: Afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknaa qablahum minal qurooni yamshoona fee masaakinihim; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil li-ulin nuhaa
translations.2: Afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlakna qablahum mina alqurooni yamshoona fee masakinihim inna fee thalika laayatin liolee alnnuha

words.translation: And if not|(for) a Word|(that) preceded|from|your Lord|surely (would) have been|an obligation|and a term|determined

translations.1: Wa-law-laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika lakaana lizaamanw Wa-'ajalun musammaa
translations.2: Walawla kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika lakana lizaman waajalun musamman

words.translation: So be patient|over|what|they say|and glorify|with praise|(of) your Lord|before|(the) rising|(of) the sun|and before|its setting|and from|(the) hours|(of) the night|and glorify|(at the) ends|(of) the day|so that you may|be satisfied

translations.1: Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona Wa-sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish shamsi Wa-qabla ghuroobihaa Wa-min aanaaa'il laili fasabbih Wa-atraafan nahaari la-'allaka tardaa
translations.2: Faisbir AAala ma yaqooloona wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tulooAAi alshshamsi waqabla ghuroobiha wamin anai allayli fasabbih waatrafa alnnahari laAAallaka tarda

words.translation: And (do) not|extend|your eyes|towards|what|We have given for enjoyment|[with it]|pairs|of them|(the) splendor|(of) the life|(of) the world|that We may test them|in it|And (the) provision|(of) your Lord|(is) better|and more lasting

translations.1: Wa-laa tamuddanna 'ainaika ilaa ma matta'na biheee azwajam minhum zahratal hayaatid dunya linaftinahum feeh; Wa-rizqu Rabbika khairunw Wa-abqaa
translations.2: Wala tamuddanna AAaynayka ila ma mattaAAna bihi azwajan minhum zahrata alhayati alddunya linaftinahum feehi warizqu rabbika khayrun waabqa

words.translation: And enjoin|(on) your family|the prayer|and be steadfast|therein|Not|We ask you|(for) provision|We|provide (for) you|and the outcome|(is) for the righteous[ness]

translations.1: Wa'mur ahlaka bis-Salaati wastabir 'alaihaa laa nas'aluka rizqaa; nahnu narzuquk; wal-'aaqibatu littaqwaa
translations.2: Wamur ahlaka bialssalati waistabir AAalayha la nasaluka rizqan nahnu narzuquka waalAAaqibatu lilttaqwa

words.translation: And they say|Why not|he brings us|a sign|from|his Lord|Has not|come to them|evidence|(of) what|(was) in|the Scriptures|the former

translations.1: Wa-qaaloo law-laa ya'teenaa bi-aayatin mir Rabbih; awa-lam ta'tihim baiyyinatu maa fis suhufil oolaa
translations.2: Waqaloo lawla yateena biayatin min rabbihi awalam tatihim bayyinatu ma fee alssuhufi aloola

words.translation: And if|We|(had) destroyed them|with a punishment|before him|before him|surely they (would) have said|Our Lord|why not|You sent|to us|a Messenger|so we (could) have followed|Your signs|before|before|[that]|we were humiliated|and disgraced

translations.1: Wa-law annaaa ahlaknaahum bi-'azaabin min qablihee laqaaloo Rabbanaa law-laaa arsalta ilainaa Rasoolan fanattabi'a Aayaatika min qabli an nazilla Wa-nakhzaa
translations.2: Walaw ann<u>a</u> ahlakn<u>a</u>hum biAAa<u>tha</u>bin min qablihi laq<u>a</u>loo rabban<u>a</u> lawl<u>a</u> arsalta ilayn<u>a</u> rasoolan fanattabiAAa <u>a</u>y<u>a</u>tika min qabli an na<u>th</u>illa wanakhz<u>a</u>

words.translation: Say|Each|(is) waiting|so await|Then you will know|who|(are the) companions|(of) the way|[the] even|and who|is guided

translations.1: Qul kullum mutarabbisun fa-tarabbasoo fa-sa-ta'lamoona man Ashaabus Siraatis Sawiyyi Wa-manih tadaa
translations.2: Qul kullun mutarabbisun fatarabbasoo fasataAAlamoona man ashabu alssirati alssawiyyi wamani ihtada
